lessons.title: A Day at the Beach
lessons.content: Tom and Ana went to the beach. They collected shells and built a sandcastle. A seagull flew overhead and they laughed.

lessons.title: The Lost Kitten
lessons.content: Lucy found a lost kitten in her garden. She gave it milk and a warm blanket. The kitten purred happily.

quiz.question: What did Lucy give the kitten?

lessons.title: A Trip to the Zoo
lessons.content: At the zoo, Max saw lions, tigers, and monkeys. He loved watching the monkeys swing from tree to tree.

lessons.title: Reading Practice: Seasons
lessons.content: There are four seasons: spring, summer, autumn, and winter. Each season has its own weather and activities.

lessons.title: Story: The Birthday Party
lessons.content: Emma's birthday party was fun. She invited her friends, played games, and had cake. Everyone enjoyed the party.

quiz.question: What did Emma have at her party?

lessons.title: Story: The Adventure
lessons.content: Jake and Mia went on an adventure in the forest. They saw birds, rabbits, and even a deer. It was exciting!

quiz.question: What did they see in the forest?

lessons.title: Reading Practice: The Weather
lessons.content: Weather can be sunny, rainy, cloudy, or snowy. Each type of weather affects what we wear and do.
